title: The Darkest Evening of the Year
description: Who will be with you in the darkest hour?Amy Redwing has devoted her life to rescuing dogs. But the unique bond she shares with Nickie, a golden retriever she saves in the most dangerous encounter of her life, is deeper than any she has ever known. In one night, their loyalty will be put to the test, and each will prove to the other how far they will goâ€”when the stakes turn deadly serious.
author: Dean Koontz
